item.title: Submit Recipe
item.description: Submit Recipe Submit your favorite jam recipe…

item.title: JAMstack Recipes
item.description: JAMstack Recipes The best jam recipes served by JAMstack and Serverless technology.

item.title: About
item.description: About This is an experiment where I’m trying to build a JAMstack site with Hugo and Azure Functions. The source code is available at: https://github.com/hlaueriksson/jamstack-cms The site is hosted by GitHub Pages at: https://hlaueriksson.github.io/jamstack-cms/ The jam recipes was taken from the Swedish site Tasteline.com: Apple Jam Lingonberry Jam Strawberry Jam Translations from Swedish to English was done with Google Translate. The images was taken from Flickr: Apples by 1sock Lingonberries by Jyrki Kymäläinen Strawberries by Fried Dough
